description:
Season Six Match
ARIEL X
The Assassin
HT: 5'3
WT: 115 lbs
Season record (2-0)
Lifetime record (9-2)
Ranked 3rd
KARRLIE DAWN
The Anvil
HT: 5'3
WT: 125lbs
Season record (0-1)
Lifetime record (0-1)
Ranked 11th
>
Welcome to the start of Season Six. A new season, with new wrestlers and amazing unscripted combat. A season that promises everything you have come to love and more.
Ariel X continues to be a teacher, and a destroyer of new girls. The Assassin is one of the best wrestlers we have who can teach the young wrestlers the ropes and then fuck them to death for losing.
This is Karrlie's second match up and we all hope that she will have potential. She has determination and a fighting spirit, now we just need to get the wrestling part down.
Ariel X applies some great non-scripted holds and submission on the new girl. Ariel goes on to finger fuck her, then drives a huge dildo home as she fucks the helpless loser on the mat.
title: Ariel X "The Assassin" (2-0) vs Karrlie Dawn "The Anvil" (0-1)
